name: Asthma Content for Kids
description: If you have asthma, you are not alone. Lots of kids have it â€” and lots take medicine to breathe better.

name: Birth Defects & Genetic Problems
description: Some babies are born with a condition called Down syndrome. Kids with Down syndrome often have medical problems and trouble learning.

name: Bladder, Kidneys & Urinary Tract
description: Millions of kids and teenagers from every part of the world wet the bed every single night. Maybe you do it.

name: Bones,Muscles & Joints for Kids
description: Broken bones have an amazing ability to heal, especially in kids. New bone forms within a few weeks of the injury, although full healing can take longer.

name: Brain & Nervous System for Kids
description: Autism spectrum disorder is a difference in the way a kids brain develops. Kids with autism may have trouble understanding the world around them.

name: Sight,Speech & Hearing for Kids
description: Vision problems can develop before a baby is born. Sometimes, parts of the eyes do not form the way they should.
